定義: 表示一段具實際效用、需吸引讀者注者，卻不包含額外重點或變音暗示的文字，如文件摘要中的關鍵字、相關評論之產品名稱、互動性文字操作軟體中具作用的詞組或文章開頭精華等。
原文定義: Represents a span of text to which attention is being drawn for utilitarian purposes without conveying any extra importance and with no implication of an alternate voice or mood, such as key words in a document abstract, product names in a review, actionable words in interactive text-driven software, or an article lede.

定義: 表示一段不連貫而有精準視覺表達目的的非文本註記，如中文專名號及錯誤拼寫的標注。
原文定義: Represents a span of text with an unarticulated, though explicitly rendered, non-textual annotation, such as labeling the text as being a proper name in Chinese text (a Chinese proper name mark), or labeling the text as being misspelt.

定義: 表示一段具參考價值而需特別標注凸顯的文字。
原文定義: Represents a run of text in one document marked or highlighted for reference purposes, due to its relevance in another context.

定義: 一段一旁標有小字注釋的文字，首要用於東亞文字排印中的文字音注或註記。
原文定義: Are short runs of text presented alongside base text, primarily used in East Asian typography as a guide for pronunciation or to include other annotations.

定義: 表示一段需要同他文孤立文字方向格式的文字。
原文定義: Represents a span of text that is to be isolated from its surroundings for the purposes of bidirectional text formatting.

定義: 表示一段精準控制文字方向格式的文字。
原文定義: Represents explicit text directionality formatting control for its children.

定義: 不具任何意義，但同全域屬性——如`class`、`lang`、`dir`等——共用時，表示其自身。
原文定義: Doesn't mean anything on its own, but can be useful when used together with the global attributes, e.g. class, lang, or dir. It represents its children.
